title: Missions ðŸ”§
body: Ive played some games after the new missions came out, and none of them are completing. For instance, the gold counter isnt going up. ive even relloged and nothing has changed. rito pls??

replies.body: Just wanted to follow up with ya on this. Make sure that if the mission is requiring you to use a Worlds icon, you're using a Worlds icon. Let me know if you're still running into issues!
